text:
When PowerPointExtractor is initialized with FileInputStream to getText() it is
throwing NullPointerException. The recent build for the same file gives a lot of
warnings with different record ID.

"No core record found with ID 13 based on PersistPtr lookup"

The PowerPoint file is in the above url.
creator: subas@wolfram.com
subas@wolfram.com
text:
File has been uploaded as per Nick Burch request.
 
thanks,
suba suresh.

creator: apache@gagravarr.org
text:
I'm getting a 404 when trying to download that file.

I believe you should now (with a SVN checkout as of 10 minutes ago) be able to
work with this file, and not get any warnings or errors.

If that's not the case, can you download the problem PPT file, re-open the bug,
and then attach the file as an attachment to this bug? I'll then take a look.
